purpose: Enforces safety constraints for live web action execution with approval status evaluation based on risk level and confidence scores
notes: Production ready. Implements LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH risk approval gates with configurable approval requirements. Dry-run tasks always approved.

purpose: Real-time monitoring dashboard showing key metrics and alerts for traffic simulation
notes: Read-only monitoring tool. Tracks execution time, success rate, error rate, adversarial blocking, pre-validation metrics. Production ready.

purpose: Analyzes Phase 10 outcomes to identify patterns, misalignments, and opportunities for policy refinement
notes: Analyzes confidence alignment, deferred patterns, success patterns, policy effectiveness. Additive module for Phase 11.

purpose: Extracts operational heuristics and patterns from Phase 12 & 13 execution data
notes: Phase 14 meta-learning. Analyzes task patterns, confidence dynamics, strategic patterns. Generates heuristics for planning.

purpose: Multi-step session state management maintaining context across sequential requests
notes: Thread-safe context tracking. Supports multi-step testing with MULTI_STEP_TESTING_ENABLED flag. Production ready.

purpose: Generates high-level goals and task candidates, optionally seeded from Phase 8 authoring snapshots
notes: Phase 10 goal generation. Loads from frontend snapshots or generates synthetic fallback tasks. Sandboxed and additive.

purpose: Generates realistic synthetic traffic to Buddy's Phase 2 system with variable request intervals and diverse content
notes: Production ready, read-only integration. Dynamic load adjustment, safety mechanisms. Supports 50-200ms intervals with 8 input categories.

purpose: Plans new multi-wave operational workflows using Phase 12 & 13 insights and meta-learning heuristics
notes: Phase 14 autonomous planning. Applies heuristics, evaluates safety gates, estimates success rates. Creates comprehensive wave plans.

purpose: Generates new workflow goals based on Phase 10 learning insights and deferred task patterns
notes: Phase 11 autonomous goal generation. Creates confidence-boosting, exploration, and validation goals based on learning.

purpose: Dynamic, prioritized task queue with workflow orchestration, dependency resolution, and conditional branching
notes: Phase 6 dynamic scheduler. Thread-safe, priority-based execution. Test file: buddy_dynamic_task_scheduler_tests.py. Production ready.

purpose: Interactive browser session manager for Mployer that keeps browser open between commands
notes: Interactive CLI for persistent browser sessions. Commands: inspect, filters, set-min, apply, extract, etc. Live web actions.

purpose: Derives adaptive policy changes from prior outcomes and confidence metrics
notes: Phase 10 policy adaptation. Updates high_risk_threshold, retry_multiplier, priority_bias based on success/failure/deferral rates.

purpose: Simulates sequences of related requests to Buddy using SessionContext with progressive difficulty
notes: Multi-step testing coordinator. Supports BASIC/INTERMEDIATE/EDGE_CASES/ADVERSARIAL difficulty levels. Read-only integration.

purpose: Main execution script for running multi-step test campaigns with command-line options
notes: CLI entry point for multi-step testing. Supports Phase 6 scheduler integration. Production ready.

purpose: Execute deterministic, progressive simulation campaign across Phases 1-6 with dry-run enforcement
notes: Read-only integration only, no feature flag changes. Generates Phase 7 readiness reports. Comprehensive end-to-end testing.

purpose: Executes tasks with controlled live web actions where safety gates permit, maintains dry-run toggle
notes: Phase 13 live executor. Safety gate evaluation per task, automatic rollback, confidence recalibration. Test file: buddy_controlled_live_tests.py

purpose: Orchestrates controlled live web action execution with safety gates and rollback, ingests Phase 12 outputs
notes: Phase 13 harness. Loads Phase 12 artifacts, adapts execution based on learned policies. Full observability. Test file: buddy_controlled_live_tests.py

purpose: Run large-scale progressive synthetic tests to collect stability, robustness, and behavior metrics across 4 waves
notes: READ-ONLY. 4 progressive waves: 1000, 2500, 5000, 5000+ requests. Baseline→Mixed→Hard Edge Cases→Adversarial. Production ready.

purpose: Autonomous learning loop that ingests Phase 10 outputs, analyzes patterns, generates adaptive goals
notes: Phase 11 self-driven harness. Autonomous goal generation, dry-run simulation. Test file: buddy_self_driven_tests.py

purpose: Calculate deterministic, continuous confidence scores (0.0-1.0) for goal execution using 4-factor weighted model
notes: Phase 2 graded confidence system. Deterministic, continuous output. Replaces bimodal distribution. Production ready.

purpose: Detect impossible or risky goals BEFORE reasoning using 6 pre-validation checks
outputs: PreValidationResult with status, failures, confidence_delta, suggested_questions
notes: Phase 2 pre-validation. 6 checks: tool availability, element existence, context, contradiction, scope, complexity. Read-only.

purpose: Determine execution path based on confidence level with approval workflow management
notes: Phase 2 approval gates. HIGH (>=0.85) immediate, MEDIUM (0.55-0.85) approval, LOW (<0.55) clarify/reject. Production ready.

purpose: Phase 5 safe integration of Vision and Arms subsystems with dry-run mode for high-risk actions
notes: Phase 5 web tools. Risk-classified actions (LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH). Dry-run mode via WEB_TOOLS_DRY_RUN env var. Thread-safe browser session.

purpose: Central registry for all agent tools with mock mode support and performance tracking
notes: Core tool registry. Supports MOCK_MODE, timeout handling, domain-scoped performance tracking. Production ready.

purpose: Intelligent memory management deciding what to save based on importance scoring (0.0-1.0)
notes: Calculates importance scores. Threshold 0.6. High importance for reflections, failures, learning. Domain-aware storage.

purpose: Unified interface for HR contact management: searching, extracting, deduplicating, enriching
notes: Main HR contact interface. Batch extraction, deduplication, filtering. Test file: test_hr_system.py. Production ready.

purpose: Expose Mployer automation as callable agent tools with screenshot capture
notes: Agent-callable Mployer functions: login, search_employers, extract_contacts. Global scraper instance. Live web actions.

purpose: Comprehensive test suite scaffold for Phase 21 with unit and integration test placeholders
notes: Test scaffold with TODOs. 5 unit test classes (AgentManager, AgentExecutor, FeedbackLoop, Monitor, Harness). Needs implementation.

purpose: Phase 22 test suite covering meta optimizer, agent tuner, scheduler, feedback loop, monitoring (32 tests)
notes: Comprehensive test coverage: strategy selection, adjustments, feedback routing, monitoring, harness integration. Production ready.

purpose: Comprehensive Phase 21 verification executing component validation, performance metrics, stress testing
notes: Full verification suite: component validation, 4-8 agent stress testing, feedback loop verification, JSONL schema validation.

purpose: Phase 22 verification script running dry-run and live executions, validating outputs, computing metrics
notes: Validates JSONL schemas, system health, metrics thresholds, anomalies. Required metrics: success_rate >=0.90, throughput >=35.0, etc.

purpose: Executes tasks in dry-run mode using Phase 6 scheduler with safe actions, generates self-questions
notes: Phase 10 simulated executor. Registers 5 safe actions: web_inspect, web_extract, web_click, web_fill, high_risk_submit. Dry-run only.

purpose: High-level interface for web inspection and learning (INSPECTION ONLY, no action execution)
notes: Vision subsystem - INSPECTION ONLY. Never calls Arms/Legs. Read-only web understanding. Production ready.

purpose: Action layer for interacting with websites based on Buddy's Vision, provides safe robust interactions
notes: Arms subsystem for web actions. Supports frames, shadow DOM, retries. Live actions: click, fill, submit, select, etc.

purpose: Core values guiding long-term improvements with alignment evaluation
notes: 5 core values: Safety & Privacy (0.25), Reliability (0.2), Efficiency (0.2), User Control (0.2), Measurable Impact (0.15).

purpose: Interface for Soul system with callbacks for approval validation, clarification, context retrieval
notes: Includes SoulInterface (abstract), MockSoulSystem (testing), HTTPSoulClient stub. Non-blocking callbacks, audit trail.

purpose: Continuously tests Phase 2 systems with progressively harder scenarios until 95% edge-case coverage
notes: Adaptive test generator with 10 difficulty levels. 12 edge case categories. Supports MockSoulSystem and real Soul API.

purpose: Complete filter mapping verification for Buddy scraper with 11 filter categories
notes: Verifies 11 filter categories: Employer Name, Employee Count, Revenue, EIN, Website, State, City, Zip, Address, Industry Include/Exclude.

purpose: Validation test suite for HR contact system components
notes: Tests: imports, ContactInfo structure, HR role detection, seniority detection, extraction, deduplication, search filtering.

purpose: Core agent with intelligent tool selection, domain inference, and step-by-step execution
notes: Domain inference: crypto, marketing, engineering, operations, _global. Max steps from Config.MAX_AGENT_STEPS. Tool selection with confidence.

purpose: Automates Mployer searches and contact extraction with cookie persistence and GoHighLevel integration
notes: Full Mployer automation: login, search with 11 filters, extract contacts, add to GHL. Cookie persistence. Test file: test_buddy_complete.py

purpose: Standalone synthetic usage harness for Buddy observation using public API (no code modifications)
notes: Standalone observation harness. 4 scenario categories: atomic, ambiguous, failure-injected, cross-domain. 500-1000 runs. Invariant violation halt.

purpose: Phase 10 adaptive harness executing sandboxed simulated waves and generating outputs
notes: Phase 10 harness. Generates goals from Phase 8 snapshots or synthetic fallback. Dry-run execution. Test file: buddy_adaptive_tests.py

purpose: Unit tests for Phase 10 adaptive harness
notes: Tests: wave execution, high-risk deferral, metrics writing, policy updates. Simple assertion-based tests.

purpose: Phase 9 self-reflective harness with self-questioning and confidence recalibration
notes: Phase 9 harness. Self-questions per task, confidence recalibration. Test file: buddy_self_reflective_tests.py

purpose: Unit tests for Phase 9 self-reflective harness
notes: Tests: self-questions generation, confidence updates, sandbox prevention, recovery metrics.

purpose: Unit tests for Phase 11 self-driven harness
notes: Tests: learning insights, autonomous goals, policy inheritance from Phase 10.

purpose: Phase 12 strategic harness with pattern-based confidence boosting and strategic decision logging
notes: Phase 12 strategic execution. Pattern-based confidence elevation. Test file: buddy_strategic_tests.py

purpose: Unit tests for Phase 12 strategic harness
notes: Tests: confidence elevation, pattern boost, strategic decisions logging, Phase 11 policy loading.

purpose: Unit tests for Phase 13 controlled live harness and executor
notes: Tests: safety gate (LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH/dry-run), executor task execution, harness initialization and execution.

purpose: Phase 14 autonomous operation harness with meta-learning and autonomous planning
notes: Phase 14 harness. Meta-learning + autonomous planning + wave simulation. Test file: buddy_phase14_tests.py

purpose: Comprehensive unit tests for Phase 14 components
notes: Tests MetaLearningEngine, WaveSimulator, AutonomousPlanner. 3 test classes with 20+ test methods.

purpose: Phase 15 autonomous operation harness with policy adaptation and execution
notes: Phase 15 harness. Loads Phase 14 plans, adapts policies, executes waves. Test file: buddy_phase15_tests.py

purpose: Unit tests for Phase 15 autonomous operation harness
notes: Tests executor, policy adapter, harness. Verifies Phase 14 integration.

purpose: Unit tests for Phase 6 dynamic task scheduler
notes: Tests TaskSchedulerTestHarness: initialization, task execution, priority ordering, dependency resolution, conditional branching.

purpose: Phase 14 wave simulator for autonomous task execution simulation with safety gates
notes: Simulates wave execution with heuristics, safety gates, success probability calculation. Test coverage in buddy_phase14_tests.py

purpose: Real-time visualization of continuous traffic metrics with charts and trends
notes: Read-only visualization tool. ASCII bar charts, rolling windows, color-coded alerts. Complements buddy_monitoring_dashboard.

purpose: System-wide validation tool checking component integrity, file existence, schema compliance
notes: Validates: file existence, JSONL schemas, required fields, data types, cross-phase dependencies. Used by verification protocols.

purpose: Integration test harness for web tools testing actual browser interactions
notes: Tests web_inspect, web_screenshot with real browser. Respects WEB_TOOLS_DRY_RUN env var. Can run in dry-run mode.

purpose: Extracts and enriches HR contacts from employer data with deduplication
notes: HR role detection, seniority level parsing, data completeness scoring, contact method counting. Test file: test_hr_system.py

purpose: Builder pattern for HR contact search parameters with preset searches
notes: Includes SeniorityLevel, ContactDataType enums. PresetSearches: decision_makers, hr_directors, c_suite, all_hr_contacts. Test file: test_hr_system.py

purpose: HTTP client for GoHighLevel API with authentication and contact management
notes: Manages GHL contacts: create, search, update. Requires GHL_API_KEY and GHL_LOCATION_ID. Live API calls.

purpose: Agent-callable tools for GoHighLevel integration
notes: Tools: ghl_add_contact, ghl_search_contact. Wraps gohighlevel_client for agent use. Live API calls.

purpose: Core vision capabilities for DOM inspection, element finding, form detection
notes: Core vision logic. Inspects pages, finds elements by action, remembers site patterns. Read-only operations only.

purpose: Manages user profiles for autofill operations
notes: Loads and provides user profile data (name, email, phone, address) for form autofill. Read-only.

purpose: Captures full-context screenshots with page state and clickable elements
notes: Captures screenshots with metadata: title, URL, page state, clickable elements. Read-only operation.

purpose: Intelligent tool selection using learned patterns and historical performance
notes: Selects best tool based on: keyword matching, historical performance, domain-specific patterns. Confidence scoring.

purpose: Tracks tool performance metrics across domains with success rates and latencies
notes: Domain-aware performance tracking. Metrics: success_rate, avg_latency, usage_count, failure_modes. Used by tool_selector.

purpose: Foundational tool implementations registered with tool_registry
notes: Registers core tools: search, analyze, compute, etc. Called by register_foundational_tools(). Production ready.

purpose: Additional specialized tools beyond foundational set
notes: Extends foundational tools with specialized capabilities. Called by register_additional_tools().

purpose: Static code analysis tool for Python files
inputs: Python file paths or code strings
outputs: Analysis results: functions, classes, imports, complexity
notes: Analyzes Python code structure: extracts functions, classes, imports, calculates complexity. Read-only.

purpose: Analyzes entire codebase structure and relationships
notes: Workspace-level code analysis. Maps modules, dependencies, relationships. Read-only.

purpose: Central configuration management for Buddy system
notes: System-wide configuration: MOCK_MODE, TIMEOUT, DEBUG, MAX_AGENT_STEPS, feature flags. Read from env vars.

purpose: Manages autonomy levels and escalation decisions
notes: Controls autonomy escalation. Levels: manual, semi-autonomous, autonomous. Respects safety constraints.

purpose: Collects and manages user feedback for agent improvements
notes: Feedback collection and storage. Supports ratings, comments, improvement suggestions. Persists to memory.

purpose: Tracks task success metrics and patterns
notes: Tracks success rates, failure patterns, task completion metrics. Used for performance analysis.

purpose: Generates exploratory questions and learning objectives
notes: Active learning component. Generates questions to explore knowledge gaps. Domain-aware curiosity.

purpose: Analyzes performance and suggests system improvements
notes: Self-improvement proposals aligned with Buddy's core values. Analyzes patterns, suggests optimizations.

purpose: Enhanced reflection system with structured analysis
notes: Structured reflection after task execution. Effectiveness scoring, confidence adjustment, strategy recommendations.

purpose: Tools for active learning and knowledge acquisition
notes: Active learning tools: search, analyze, synthesize. High importance scoring for memory persistence.

purpose: Graph-based knowledge representation and querying
notes: Knowledge graph for entity relationships. Supports queries, traversal, inference. Read-only queries.

purpose: Decomposes complex goals into executable sub-tasks
notes: Goal decomposition for complex multi-step tasks. Identifies dependencies, suggests execution order.

purpose: Multi-agent orchestration with task distribution
notes: Coordinates multiple agents for complex workflows. Task distribution, result aggregation.

purpose: Iteratively decomposes goals with feedback loops
notes: Iterative goal decomposition with refinement. Learns from execution feedback.

purpose: Executes tasks iteratively with adaptive refinement
notes: Iterative execution with learning. Adapts strategy based on intermediate results.

purpose: Streaming execution with real-time progress updates
notes: Real-time execution with progress streaming. Supports callbacks for UI updates.

purpose: Enhanced reasoning capabilities for agent decision-making
notes: Structured reasoning with trace. Supports constraint checking, confidence scoring.

purpose: Sandboxed Python code execution environment
notes: Isolated Python execution. Timeout protection, output capture. Potentially unsafe without proper sandboxing.

purpose: General web scraping utilities
notes: HTTP-based web scraping. No browser automation. Read-only operations.

purpose: Deep page inspection and analysis
notes: Detailed page inspection. Complements buddys_vision_core. Read-only.

purpose: Schedules and automates Mployer data collection tasks
notes: Periodic Mployer automation. Scheduled searches and data extraction. Live web actions.

purpose: Secure credential storage and retrieval
notes: Reads credentials from environment variables. No encryption (env-based security).

purpose: Interactive CLI session manager for Buddy
notes: CLI session management. Command loop, state persistence. Read-only queries, variable actions.

purpose: Microsoft Graph API integration for email operations
notes: MS Graph email operations: send, read, search. Requires authentication. Live API calls.

purpose: Discovery and exploration of new capabilities
notes: Capability discovery. Explores available tools, APIs, resources. Read-only exploration.

purpose: Extended tool set beyond core and additional tools
notes: Further tool extensions. Specialized capabilities. Registered with tool_registry.

purpose: Enhanced visual perception and screenshot analysis
notes: Visual analysis capabilities. Screenshot-based understanding. Read-only.

purpose: Generates clarification questions when confidence is low
notes: Phase 2 clarification system. Generates targeted questions for ambiguous goals. Read-only.

purpose: Unified response schema builder for Phase 2 systems
notes: Phase 2 response builder. Creates consistent response format across all Phase 2 components.

purpose: Wrapper for Soul API integration with fallback to MockSoulSystem
notes: Soul API integration layer. Environment-based switching between real and mock. Production ready.

purpose: Staging deployment script for Phase 2 systems
notes: Deployment automation stub. Needs implementation for production deployment.

purpose: Continuous monitoring of Phase 2 system health
notes: Continuous health monitoring. Tracks metrics, generates alerts, trend analysis. Read-only.

purpose: Synthetic test harness for Phase 2 system testing
notes: Synthetic testing framework. Generates and executes test scenarios. Read-only integration.

purpose: Analyzes Phase 2 test results for patterns and insights
notes: Post-test analysis. Identifies patterns, failure modes, improvement opportunities. Read-only.

purpose: Complete progressive testing suite for Phase 2
notes: Comprehensive progressive testing. Orchestrates adaptive tests across difficulty levels.

purpose: Reports current status of Phase 2 systems
notes: System status reporter. Component health, readiness checks. Read-only.

purpose: Analyzes confidence calibration accuracy
notes: Confidence calibration analysis. Compares predictions vs outcomes. Suggests weight adjustments.

purpose: CLI utility to display various metric files
notes: Simple metric viewer. Displays JSON metrics in readable format. Read-only.

purpose: Starts Buddy backend server
notes: Server startup script. Launches backend API server. Live service.

purpose: Entry point script with quick start instructions
notes: Quick start guide and entry point. Displays instructions, checks system readiness.

purpose: Quick start script for Phase 2 systems
notes: Phase 2 quick start. Setup validation, component checks, example usage.

purpose: Quick verification script for Phase 21
notes: Fast Phase 21 verification. Subset of full verification protocol for rapid checks.

purpose: Verification script for Phase 19
notes: Phase 19 dry-run verification. Validates harness execution, metrics, outputs.

purpose: Tests persistent browser session functionality
notes: Tests browser persistence across commands. Live browser actions.

purpose: Simple navigation test for web tools
notes: Basic navigation testing. Verifies web_inspect functionality. Read-only.
